verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that someone said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Behold, <S%H1><s%> your father is sick. <S%H2470><s%>" He took <S%H3947><s%> with him his two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

Someone told <S%H5046><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H1121><s%> your son Joseph <S%H3130><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H3478><s%>" and Israel strengthened <S%H2388><s%> himself, <S%H3427><s%> and sat on the bed. <S%H4296><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me at Luz <S%H3870><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and blessed me, <S%H1288><s%>

and said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6509><s%> 'Behold, I will make you fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> and I will make of you a company <S%H6951><s%> of peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you <S%H310><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession. <S%H272><s%>'

Now your two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to you into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> are mine; <S%H669><s%> Ephraim and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> even as Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> will be mine.

Your issue, <S%H4138><s%> whom you become the father <S%H3205><s%> of after <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H7121><s%> will be yours. They will be called after <S%H5921><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their brothers <S%H251><s%> in their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

As for me, <S%H935><s%> when I came from Paddan, <S%H6307><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by me in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> when <S%H5750><s%> there was still some <S%H3530><s%> distance <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> and I buried her <S%H6912><s%> there in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%> (the same is Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>)."
Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Who are these?"

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "They are my sons, <S%H1121><s%> whom God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me here. <S%H559><s%>" He said, "Please bring them <S%H3947><s%> to me, <S%H1288><s%> and I will bless them."

Now the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were dim <S%H3513><s%> for age, <S%H2207><s%> so that he couldn't <S%H3201><s%> see. <S%H7200><s%> He brought them near <S%H5066><s%> to him; <S%H5401><s%> and he kissed them, <S%H2263><s%> and embraced them.

Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "I didn't <S%H6419><s%> think I would see <S%H7200><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> and behold, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has let me see your seed also. <S%H2233><s%>"
Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought them out <S%H3318><s%> from between <S%H5973><s%> his knees, <S%H1290><s%> and he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself with his face <S%H639><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them both, <S%H8147><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in his right hand <S%H3225><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s left hand, <S%H8040><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in his left hand <S%H8040><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and brought them near to him. <S%H5066><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> stretched out <S%H7971><s%> his right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and laid <S%H7896><s%> it on Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s head, <S%H7218><s%> who was the younger, <S%H6810><s%> and his left hand <S%H8040><s%> on Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s head, <S%H7218><s%> guiding <S%H7919><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> knowingly, <S%H7919><s%> for Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was the firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>

He blessed <S%H1288><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "The God <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> walked, <S%H1980><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> who has fed <S%H7462><s%> me all my life long <S%H5750><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%>

the angel <S%H4397><s%> who has redeemed <S%H1350><s%> me from all evil, <S%H7451><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the lads, <S%H5288><s%> and let my name <S%H8034><s%> be named <S%H7121><s%> on them, <S%H8034><s%> and the name of my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac. <S%H3327><s%> Let them grow <S%H1711><s%> into a multitude <S%H7230><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that his father <S%H1><s%> laid <S%H7896><s%> his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> it displeased <S%H3415><s%> him. <S%H8551><s%> He held up his father <S%H1><s%>'s hand, <S%H3027><s%> to remove <S%H5493><s%> it from Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%> to Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s head. <S%H7218><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> "Not so, <S%H1><s%> my father; for this is the firstborn; <S%H1060><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> your right hand <S%H3225><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>"

His father <S%H1><s%> refused, <S%H3985><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I know, <S%H3045><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> I know. <S%H3045><s%> He also will become a people, <S%H5971><s%> and he also will be great. <S%H1431><s%> However, <S%H199><s%> his younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> will be greater <S%H1431><s%> than he, <S%H2233><s%> and his seed will become a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of nations. <S%H1471><s%>"

He blessed <S%H1288><s%> them that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "In you will Israel <S%H3478><s%> bless, <S%H1288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H430><s%> 'God make <S%H7760><s%> you as Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and as Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'" He set <S%H7760><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Behold, <S%H4191><s%> I am dying, but God <S%H430><s%> will be with you, <S%H7725><s%> and bring you again to the land <S%H776><s%> of your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Moreover I have given <S%H5414><s%> to you one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H7926><s%> above your brothers, <S%H251><s%> which I took <S%H3947><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> with my sword <S%H2719><s%> and with my bow. <S%H7198><s%>"
